description: Action to create a replication of the source bot in the secondary region.

parameters.name: botId
parameters.description: The request for the unique bot ID of the source bot to be replicated in the secondary region.

parameters.name: replicaRegion
parameters.description: The request for the secondary region that will be used in the replication of the source bot.

nested_items.name: botId
nested_items.description: The unique bot ID of the replicated bot generated.

nested_items.name: replicaRegion
nested_items.description: The region of the replicated bot generated.

nested_items.name: sourceRegion
nested_items.description: The source region for the source bot used for the replicated bot generated.

nested_items.name: creationDateTime
nested_items.description: The creation date and time of the replicated bot generated.

nested_items.name: botReplicaStatus
nested_items.description: The operational status of the replicated bot generated.
